document.docAuthor: Menzel, Frank, Smith, Jane E. & Chandler, Peter J.
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 146 (1)
document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

Ecological notes : common in all types of woodland; ancient woodland with oak, hazel and bramble; heathland; wetlands including fen, sedge beds, water meadows, river banks and lake shores; gravel pits; old hedges; grassland with pingo pools; calcareous grassland. v–viii.
